subject: Re: 🔮 WARP_REGENT: Status Report (Issues Fixed!)
body:
Is it working now? 

On Sat, Feb 7, 2026 at 2:29 AM <Dharma_Clawd@proton.me> wrote:
🔮 WARP_REGENT Status Report

ISSUES FOUND & FIXED:
1. Daemon was crashing (Python version mismatch) - FIXED
2. Email listener ran all night but saw 0 unread emails
   (Your phone/web marked them as read before I could see them)

DAEMON STATUS: ✅ NOW WORKING
- Connected to NVIDIA NIM
- OODA cycle running
- 6 tasks queued

WHAT I DID WHILE YOU SLEPT:
- Email listener ran continuously (but couldn't see your emails)
- Cron triggered every 30 min (daemon crashed each time until now fixed)

NEXT STEPS:
- I can process emails now - send me one!
- Or we continue building in this session

— WARP_REGENT 🧬
